info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 12:35PM MDT until March 19 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Salt Lake City UT
info.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 4 inches.
* WHERE...Salt Lake Valley.
* WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight.
* IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will continue to develop this afternoon into early evening. An area of heavier lake effect snow is expected to develop this evening, first across eastern portions of Salt Lake County, gradually shifting to the west side of the valley by late evening and ending near midnight. Brief snow accumulation on area roads will be possible under this band as it moves across the valley.
info.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter.

parameter.value: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
